p: During the process of leave-one-out cross-validation, we started from the default value (γ = 0.0556, ε = 0.1), then we adjusted the C value to observe the model fitting results ( Table 3). The same method was applied to the selection of the other two parameters, γ and ε ( Tables 4 and 5). The values of these three parameters were evaluated according to the lowest test error, then the optimal parameters of the model were determined ( C = 2, γ = 0.005, ε = 0.0001).
